In this blog post, we will take a look at the overview of the Philippines, what makes a jaw-dropping house design, and examples of jaw-dropping Philippine house designs Overview of the Philippines The Philippines is an archipelago located in Southeast Asia It is composed of more than ,000 islands and is known for its beautiful beaches, stunning landscapes, and rich culture The Philippines is also known for its diverse architecture, with traditional, modern, and contemporary houses all over the country
